data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Vector2D is based on Leendert Ammeraal's VEC.CPP as presented in
    his book 'Programming Principles in Computer Graphics'. I feel many
    might find it easy to use and useful for writting "wireframe" 2D
    video games. I demonstrate how to use Vector2D in the script
    LunarLander.pl.

    I am new to PAUSE and you probably know better than I what would be
    a good name space.
